main_definition: Religious refers to anything related to or involving religion, beliefs, practices, faith, devotion, or spirituality.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Pertaining to religious faith or observance
meanings_and_examples.example: She attends the religious service every Sunday.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Involving strict adherence to religious doctrines and practices
meanings_and_examples.example: The family follows a very religious lifestyle, strictly observing their traditions.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Related to spirituality or the divine in general
meanings_and_examples.example: His writings explore various aspects of human spirituality and religion.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Exhibiting a deep reverence for religious matters, often with an emphasis on respectful behavior
meanings_and_examples.example: She greeted the monks in her most religious manner, bowing deeply as she passed by.
